snippet.title: Trailer Plastic Invasion - A Super Magical Mermaid Adventure
snippet.description:
Here is the trailer of Plastic Invasion - A Super Magical Mermaid Adventure, a small Game made during the Ludum Dare 55 with the Theme "Summon".

Play here : https://allosius.itch.io/plastic-invasion

Ludum Dare entry : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/55/plastic-invasion-a-super-magical-mermaid-adventure

Every Year 19-23 million tonnes of plastic waste leaks into aquatic ecosystems, polluting lakes, rivers and seas. 

More than 250 species are in danger. At that speed we would have more plastic in the ocean than fishes.This game highlights the disastrous effects of the plastics dumped in the ocean and threatening the entire marine ecosystem, take on the role of a magical mermaid, ready to fight to protect marine wildlife.

Summon magical creatures such as explosive starfish and a giant manta ray that sweeps away everything in its path, to save the animals and prevent them from disappearing beneath this "continent of plastics".

This game was made in 2 days for Ludum Dare and another Game Jam organised by l'INA, a big french institution.

Credits:
Jeanne Rossat : Game Artist
Sonia Moktefi : Game Artist
Cyril Boivin - Game Artist
Louna Queroix - Game Artist
Alice Bruyere - Game Artist
Yanis Queroix - Game Programmer
Romain Dubar - Game Designer
Geoffrey Cantrel - Game Designer

Song : Fuzzeke - The Fantasy

Copyright INA : 20 heures TF1 - 04/16/2014
Un nouveau "7e continent" de plastiques découvert dans l'Atlantique
